string.value: #b#@1052103:##k in #b#m103000000##k is worried because there are too many #rPigs#k around. Let's go find her.

She says there are too many #rPigs#k on the way to #b#m103000000##k from #b#m100000000##k.

Hunt 30 #rPigs#k in #b#m103020000##k!

Report back to #b#@1052103:##k in #b#m103000000##k upon completion.
You have swept the #rPigs#k that were blocking people's way to #b#m103000000##k!
Not a lot of people have been coming to #b#m103000000##k as of late. I couldn't figure it out for the longest time, but I finally realized why.\n\nIt's because of the #rPigs#k! Won't you help?

A friend of mine from #b#m100000000##k who came to visit not too long ago told me that it was too hard to get here because of those Pigs. My friend was able to get here safely, but people may abandon this village altogether if this keeps up!
So, I was wondering if you could help. You see a lot of #rPigs#k in #b#m103020000##k. Would you be able to defeat about 30 of them? Alright, let's get to it then!
Back already? Thanks to you, my friends in #b#m100000000##k will be able to come visit me more often! Thank you! Hee hee!
